TopicTitle: BDA Project "Christmas Present" Started [Could Use Help]

Articles.Content:
These last few weeks I've been pondering on a "project" for some time now and today... Today I finally decided that it's time to take it one step further and make an announcement about how I have a very BIG Christmas present for the BDA community, especially those who want a bit more to their battles.

I don't want to say too much (after all it IS a present, what do you want to ruin the surprise?), but what I would like to ask, is for help from the community in making this. The project as a whole is a large one, and if it were to see full fruition it would entail new mods and more, but for now, I'm going to just rely on getting the basics down. Nevertheless, I would love help, and if you would like to participate in the development.

If your curious as to how you can help, I can use voice actors, aircraft creators, mod creators, and anyone willing to help with small handiwork. If you want to help with the first offer, just please make sure you have a good microphone and if you do, shoot me a forum PM about your interest. If your interested to help with the second offer and be an aircraft creator, just submit me your crafts (stock crafts only (with the exception of BDA). I doubt I'll get much in the modding department, but any help is appreciated and the details of what would be preferable are hopefully not too extreme.

 

So I hope the BDA fighting community is ready for the biggest Christmas Present they'll ever receive.
